Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.name: keyPath
Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.abstract: The stringified version of the object’s keypath by which to sort. Can also be supplied as #keyPath(...).

Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.name: ascending
Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.abstract: Whether or not to sort ascending; default is true.

Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.name: caseInsensitive
Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.abstract: Whether or not to disregard case sensitivity on sorting strings; default is false (case matters).

Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.name: asNSSortDescriptor
Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.abstract: Converts this into an NSSortDescriptor, using NSString.caseInsensitiveCompare if necessary.

Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.name: cacheKey
Structs/SortDescriptor.html#/s:8Flapjack.abstract: A unique string version of the contents of this sort descriptor, handy for injecting into a longer cache key.

Structs/SortDescriptor.html.name: SortDescriptor
Structs/SortDescriptor.html.abstract: A simple struct for encapsulating rules for sorting a list. Conveniently maps to NSSortDescriptor when necessary.

Protocols/SingleDataSource.html#/s:8Flap.name: ModelType
Protocols/SingleDataSource.html#/s:8Flap.abstract: A generic alias for the underlying type of model object matched and monitored by the data source.
